sense.def:
A trail
je ne posebej vzdrževana pot prek odprte pokrajine ali skozi gozd.

seg.quote: They trudged along the seemingly endless trail.

sense.def:
A trail
je niz sledov ali drugih znakov, ki jih za seboj pusti nekdo ali nekaj, ko gre po neki podlagi.

seg.quote: She didn't want him to leave a trail of wet footprints all over the house.

sense.def:
Kdor je
on the trail of a person or animal
, poskuša odkriti določeno osebo ali žival.

Kadar nekdo
trails something
ali kadar nekaj visečega
trails
, se tisto ohlapno premika.

seg.quote: She trails the fingers of her right hand through the water.
She went out with her dress trailing behind her on the floor.

sense.def:
To trail along
pomeni premikati se počasi in brez energije ali navdušenja, pogosto za nekom drugim.

seg.quote: I used to trail around after him like a small child.

sense.def:
Kadar govorčev glas
trails away
ali
trails off
, postopoma postaja vedno bolj negotov, dokler popolnoma ne utihne.

seg.quote: ‘I have an appointment that's very...’ His voice trailed off unconvincingly.
